message.body: It really hits home how old we actually are when your alone Drinking in Denver waiting for your parents to show up for a Rockies game
Lol yep flashes of reality have been enlightening
So far I do not like book five at all and now she's losing her free will!
Cuz she isn't with dex.
Lol idk if the two are connected but ill find out!
That book is crap! What a fucking shitty ending Jesus!
Haha what ending?
To book five he gets arrested she gets put in a cell it's fucked
Oh I know! I wasn't pissed ecause I never saw any of them as an ending because the next book is a click away
I'm still pissed
Hahaha I'm sorry yeah that is just about the worst ending ever. I understand cliff hangers have their purpose but seriously!
Why would she put this book in his perspective!
Yeah it's annoying :(
Very
But you understand why soon
Great
I'm reading another girl who can see ghosts series but its more like ghost whisperer than ghost hunters
Is it as good?
Yup it's a series by Terri Reid I'm only on the second book and my mom said she got bored by te fourth
That doesn't sound promising let me know how it is when you get to the fourth
Haha ok. She usually doesn't like the same books as us anyway. I'm kind of surprised she got 4 books into something that was so devoted to ghosts
Lol that's fair I do like this series of yours
Pisses me off that now we wait for the next ones
Ya I'm not looking forward to that I almost thought about reading this one slower
Almost...
Ya it's not happening ill probably finish it tonight
I did the same thing. I think only one of them I took two days to read
Lol same for me and that was only cause I was driving for 6 hours one day
We're never going to change thank god your my go to when I become a crazy book reading cat lady in my old age
Haha yup I was actually busy that day too trips to Denver and work to be done. Then back to reading
I got a cat right next me grab Meiko lets go
Hell ya!! I just have to wait to have her shipped out
Poor Meiko being shipped
Somehow
We could have a creepy cat road trip and take pictures of them at stupid road stops
Lmao! I am so in tho we would have to drug them so we would be taking pictures of very unawake cats
I thought you said it would make sense why she switched ppl I'm like 1/4 of the way through and I got nothing
Well when I said soon I meant maybe towards the last quarter of the book
Lmao we need to work on out definitions
I feel like I'm reading Christine and her carpathians again!
Yeah it's pretty bad!
Ok then don't knock her up... Why is everything so damn dramatic with these books
Oh of course don't tell her I'm ganna stop reading this soon
Right! She's gotta know!
I'm pissed
Looking your cat in the eye and saying "your a little whore" ah parenthood
Lmao such a good parent
